education:
Yong Cao has been a Bachelor candidate in Communication Engineering from Sichuan University, China since 2014.
In 2018, he has been a Ph.D candidate at Embedded and Pervasive Computing (EPIC) Lab in School of Computer Science and Technology, HUST.
research_interest: Cognitive computing, Communication network, Internet of Things, etc.
